title: Update regarding Velocity Motors
story_body:
Velocity Motors (VELO) has announced the appointment of Jane Doe as Director of Marketing, effective immediately. 

As of 2023-02-15 08:00:00 EST, Velocity Motors' marketing department will be overseen by Ms. Doe, who brings over a decade of industry experience to the role.

In other news, Velocity Motors has launched a revised website, now accessible at https://www.velocitymotors.com, featuring updated product information and streamlined navigation. The website update, which went live on 2023-02-10 14:00:00 EST, aims to enhance user experience and provide easier access to company resources.

Additionally, Velocity Motors has released its 2022 Sustainability Report, detailing the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives and progress. The report, available for download on the company's website, highlights Velocity Motors' commitment to reducing its carbon footprint and promoting diversity and inclusion within the organization.
